name: SurfPatch
author: AFNI Team
description: Creates a patch of surface formed by nodes in a nodefile and optionally calculates the volume between the same patch on two isotopic surfaces.

inputs.description: Spec file containing input surfaces
inputs.name: Spec File

inputs.description: Input surface A
inputs.name: Input Surface A

inputs.description: Input surface B
inputs.name: Input Surface B

inputs.description: File containing nodes defining the patch
inputs.name: Node File

inputs.description: Index of the column containing the nodes
inputs.name: Node Column Index

inputs.description: Index of the column containing labels of the nodes in column inode
inputs.name: Label Column Index

inputs.description: Prefix of output patch
inputs.name: Output Prefix

inputs.description: Minimum number of nodes specified for a triangle to be made a part of the patch (1 <= min_hits <= 3); default is 2
inputs.name: Minimum Hits

inputs.description: Only nodes that are labeled with this label are considered for the patch
inputs.name: Mask Label

inputs.description: Calculate the volume formed by the patch on surf_A and surf_B. Requires only two surfaces specified with surf_A and surf_B.
inputs.name: Calculate Volume

inputs.description: Only calculate the volume, don't write out patches.
inputs.name: Volume Only

inputs.description: Turn surface patch into a surface where only nodes used in forming the mesh are preserved.
inputs.name: Patch to Surface

inputs.description: Multiply node coordinates by a gain. Useful for enlarging tiny patches for easier viewing in SUMA.
inputs.name: Coordinate Gain

inputs.description: Check if the patch has a section hanging by one node to the rest of the mesh. Default when -vol or -vol_only are used.
inputs.name: Check Bowtie

inputs.description: Modify patch to eliminate bowties.
inputs.name: Fix Bowtie

inputs.description: Do not check for, or fix bowties. Default when -vol* are not used.
inputs.name: OK Bowtie

inputs.description: Shrink patch contours at nodes that were not in nodefile.
inputs.name: Adjust Contour

inputs.description: Do not adjust contours. This is the default.
inputs.name: Do Not Adjust Contour

inputs.description: Write out the stitched surface used to calculate the volume.
inputs.name: Stitched Surface

inputs.description: Change orientation of triangles before writing surfaces.
inputs.name: Flip Orientation

inputs.description: Set verbosity level, 1 is the default.
inputs.name: Verbosity Level
